data.text: @ComposedClaytor @POTUS Cosidering the idiots on left are now attacking Lincoln, Washington, and Jefferson  (just like he said they would)&polls agree with him?
@ComposedClaytor @POTUS He defends them all.  It's our history.  I'm sure the artist that did the statues thinks they are beautiful as well.
@POTUS Something can be extremely beautiful and represent something quite ugly.
